# Dataset {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}
https://nlftp.mlit.go.jp/ksj/index.html
```{r Dataset}
node.sf <- sf::read_sf(
    "input/River_Tokyo_2008/W05-08_13-g_RiverNode.shp"
)
stream.sf <- sf::read_sf(
    "input/River_Tokyo_2008/W05-08_13-g_Stream.shp"
)

tokyo.sf <- sf::read_sf(
    "input/Tokyo_2022/N03-22_13_220101.shp"
)

sf::st_crs(node.sf) <- "+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84"
sf::st_crs(stream.sf) <- "+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84"
sf::st_crs(tokyo.sf) <- "+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84"
```


# Viz
```{r}
m <- leaflet(data = stream.sf) %>%
    addProviderTiles(
        provider = providers$Stamen, 
        layerId = NULL, 
        options = providerTileOptions(opacity = 0.3)
    ) %>%
    setView(lng = 139.730, lat = 35.675, zoom = 12) %>% 
    addPolygons(
        data = tokyo.sf, 
        fill = TRUE, 
        fillColor = col.mt, 
        fillOpacity = 0.1, 
        stroke = FALSE, 
        color = col.pr.gray,
        weight = 2.0, 
        dashArray = "1", 
        opacity = .8 
    ) %>% 
    addPolylines(
        layerId = NULL, 
        group = NULL, 
        stroke = TRUE, 
        color = col.bmc.sky, 
        weight = 3, 
        opacity = 1.0, 
        fill = FALSE, 
        fillColor = NULL, 
        fillOpacity = 1.0, 
        dashArray = NULL, 
        smoothFactor = 0.5, 
        noClip = FALSE, 
        popup = NULL, 
        popupOptions = NULL, 
        label = NULL, 
        labelOptions = NULL, 
        options = pathOptions(), 
        highlightOptions = NULL, 
        data = stream.sf
    ) %>% 
    addLabelOnlyMarkers(
        lng = 139.90, lat = 35.567, 
        label = "Rivers in central Tokyo", 
        labelOptions = labelOptions(
            noHide = T, 
            direction = "bottom",
            # textsize = "30px", 
            textOnly = T,
            style = list(
                "color" = "white",
                "font-family" = "Times New Roman", 
                "font-weight" = "bold", 
                "font-size" = "40px"
                # "box-shadow" = "3px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.25)",
                # "border-color" = "rgba(0,0,0,0.5)"
            ))
    ) %>% 
    addLabelOnlyMarkers(
        lng = 139.94, lat = 35.545, 
        label = "@ Maxwell_110", 
        labelOptions = labelOptions(
            noHide = T, 
            direction = "bottom",
            # textsize = "30px", 
            textOnly = T,
            style = list(
                "color" = "white",
                "font-family" = "Times New Roman", 
                "font-weight" = "bold", 
                "font-size" = "20px"
                # "box-shadow" = "3px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.25)",
                # "border-color" = "rgba(0,0,0,0.5)"
            ))
    )
m
```
